website_summaries.verdict: The elder statesman of next generation consoles, the PlayStation 2 has the luxury of a year's head start and many solid games.
cons: Still waiting for hard drive peripheral

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointing. Also
customer_reviews.text: Console was advertised as "Good condition" and that it would play games. Turns out mine is full of 15 years worth of dust and doesn't read games, it powers on... But it doesn't read games. Pretty disappointing. Also, either the memory card I received with the console doesn't work or the first slot for the memory card doesn't work. Also a huge bummer. So much for "Good condition".
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Maxwell books and electronics is a NO GO
customer_reviews.text: Ordered through maxwell books and electronics. Didn't come with cords or controller and I recieved attitude with their response when I messaged. If I was angry before I inquired with them about the shoddy product I recieved, it was nothing to my frustration with their inconsiderate response.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I understand these are used playstations, but mine was just delivered filled with grime and never cleaned, besides the dirtyness,.. the controller does not work, and there is a rattling coming from inside the system with a very annoying clicking sound coming from the playstation as its on. Probably THE most dissapointing item i've ever purchased off of amazon.
customer_reviews.author: amj991

customer_reviews.title: If a problem arrises they are good and quick to fix them.
customer_reviews.text: So I got this as a christmas present for my son. It came with a controller and all the cords. Sadly when my son opened it and tried to play with it on Christmas we discovered the player two port didn't work. Gameswift was AMAZING working with us to get it resolved. I am so thrilled that they were so patient and understanding and quick to respond and get it taken care of for us. We will definitely be shopping through them in the future. THANKS GAMESWIFT!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Memories, Memories...
customer_reviews.text: Received mine with a defective disk drive. Though it's not the seller to blame. These old things are now 16 years old. So it's expected of them. But not too hard to replace if you've got the time and the tools. Oh, And the money! Loving it so far! Now reads good, Plays well, And brings back a lot of memories. Came with a controller, Memory card, power cord and video cord. Had Gran Turismo 4 as well! Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan F.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I received it in two days after purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I received it in two days after purchasing it. I recommend the seller GameSwift (that's who I bought my ps2 from). I'm very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Playstation2-like brand new
customer_reviews.text: This is a chunkier playstation2 than the slim I originally had, but it works great and came with a gaming paddle. It wasn't due in the mail until the 27th but it came in at least a week earlier. My husband has had to pry me away from playing my game to come to bed for the last two nights. I didn't realize how much I miss playing my games. Thank you excellant condition-Five stars to the sellor.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Needs better QA
customer_reviews.text: The disk reading laser wasn't reading disks when it arrived. I had to open the console and clean the laser with alcohol and a Q-tip. After that, it has been giving me hours of awesome nostalgia!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Nielson

customer_reviews.title: The Playstion 2 game console still lives.
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I'm an old school gamer and I really enjoyed many of my gaming experiences on the ps2 console. I purchased this one used and is working perfectly. There"s a little wear on it but that should be expected. Its a console which came out in the year 2000. I'm using this console to play some of the games I have not played yet. I got lucky with this console because it works well. In the future I may Mod it to play games off of a hard disk drive. The PS2 gaming console still lives.
customer_reviews.author: Reemus

customer_reviews.title: Not as described did not operate properly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered collectible very good, what was shipped was at best a high good and even though ps2 is backwards compatible it would not play ps1 games. After contacting the seller I was offered another unit that was confirmed good for ps1 but after a few days I inquired on the status and was told none they had would play ps1 games and was offered a full refund. I gave three stars only because of the refund but was disappointed in the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Died within first 30mins of playing
customer_reviews.text: I found my old The Hobbit game for PS2 and decided to purchase a cheap PS2 solely for the one game because I could not find mine. The console made a loud whirring noise the entire time it was turned on and I can't remember if that's normal or not. I was able to play my game for about 30 minutes before the console just died. Oh well. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tauriel

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piece of crap and it was broken. It came with absolutely nothing and after going to game stop and getting the power cord and audio and video cords, it didn’t even work. I emailed the sellers to get a refund and tell them it was broken and I got no reply! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Only Buy from Game Swift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this with Game Swift, i paid alot but the ratings were unreal, and if I am buying something, I am willing to pay more if I know it is going to work. This PS2 could be brand new i would have been fooled. I expected the fan to make noise or for it to have a defect but perfect and actually arrived in 36 hours, unreal!
customer_reviews.author: B. Azadi

customer_reviews.title: It's a PS2
customer_reviews.text: It is as stated....except not all that clean, the controller didn't function (good thing I had extras), and the disk drive is a little janky so it sometimes sticks and doesn't come out all the way so it immediately goes back in. It's like an extra game included in the price: How quick can you get a disk on/off of the trey? Otherwise, it works fine. One of the kids is currently playing through Final Fantasy IX.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Feagins

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, complete package with all cables; the toss in 3 extra games, memory card, and wired controller were a nice bonus! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!! Wonderful service!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works Amazing!!! Plays the games perfectly!!! I got a controller that didn't work but as soon as I told them about it they gave us immediately a new one!!! Wonderful service and an amazing game system!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi And Geramii

customer_reviews.title: A (near) perfect replacement for my old one
customer_reviews.text: My original PS2 decided to become a paperweight recently. After some online shopping, I came across this deal of a replacement, and it's perfect! Well, almost. The only bad points are the video cable's slightly loose in its port, and the cable that came with it had some connector pins missing, but luckily I had another on hand in better condition. Apart from that, I honestly can't complain; not for the price I got it at.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gregory

customer_reviews.title: and everything seems to work great. Havent tried the memory card yet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased mine from Decluttr Store.Just recieved it about 30 mins ago, and everything seems to work great.Havent tried the memory card yet.I also thought th av cords weren't going to work due to half the little metal prongs were missing on the end that plugs into the system , but it actually works just fine.Granted, I read the details on each ps2 advertised and went with a pricier one.Well worth it.One last thing, they said it would come with a wireless controller but it didnt,not really an issue though.Good luck finding the right one for you.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great system and fast friendly service.
customer_reviews.text: The product was good and worked just like it should. The company was polite and helped awnser some questions I had. They were fast and friendly. Great product and everything was in perfect condition. The system still works to this day Sept 20,2019 I've had it for 3 years. I recommend them. Thank you for looking and have a great day!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Nice PS2 Console
customer_reviews.text: First I did some cleaning, then I turned it on, I noticed the Date and Time was reset. I was assuming the clock battery was dead. So I set the Date and Time. And I tested two of my PS2 games, one PS1 game, and a Movie DVD, and they work pretty well. When I unplugged the PS2 and then plugged it back in. The Date and Time was still set. Turns out the clock battery might've been replaced. Although it did include a controller which doesn't work properly. And it did include some third-party hookup cables. It didn't include the Memory Card. But thankfully, I already ordered a 64MB Memory Card for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Nagley

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be very aware.
customer_reviews.text: Heart breaking to watch my Son open the box to find nothing but a Dusty ps2 player. False advertising no controller, no power cord. The only thing that I was aware of was it didn't come with a memory card. I purchase one of them and a couple of games. But Amazon took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Shelby mack

customer_reviews.title: Seller is awesome! Love my PS2!
customer_reviews.text: My purchase came one day before it was due to arrive. Plugged it up and it plays perfectly. A few scratches on the front but its used so t hats expected. Me and my 4 year old tested my new PS2 out and we love it!!! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: dallie

customer_reviews.title: The console works as intended, but the controller that ...
customer_reviews.text: The console works as intended, but the controller that I was given was not working. I had to purchase another one in order to play the games. The tray is a bit slow when coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Jennett

customer_reviews.title: I love playing all of my favorite games
customer_reviews.text: When I bought it, I was excited to play all of my old PS2 games! However I was worried because after starting it up, it wouldn't read any of the disks. Thankfully after a few hours of watching videos of how to fix the problem and how to clean the PS2, I got it to work. So be wary that it could happen to you, but it is fixable! I love playing all of my favorite games!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got what was expected
customer_reviews.text: This product came exactly as described, everything works properly and still with a fair amount of speed I suspect this system has low hours of use on it. Shipping went out quick and went through usps at a normal speed with no hang ups on that end. I recommend this seller to anyone looking to purchase and if buying something used make sure to read the description so you know what you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: R Xiyan

customer_reviews.title: Check local game store first
customer_reviews.text: Product worked, however there were problems with it. Memory card slot 2 was broken, the controllers left analog stick was broken (GTA, horn would always be on), upon start up the system would make a nasty sound and all games would skip at some points during cut scenes. I know this system was used however it seamed like the system was on its last lag. I found a much nicer one, and one in much better condition at a lower price at a local video game store.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Stops Working After 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to find a PS2 available and crossed our fingers it would work. It fired up right out the box and we were thrilled. About 10 minutes into the game, the screen goes black. We tried cleaning our game discs, tried different game discs, tried it on different TVs. The malfunction is consistent regardless of what we tried. Returned the unit this week. We'll see how the refund process goes.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: well designed classic console
customer_reviews.text: I had the slim model and was surprised at this one's bigger size but I like it, and think the design is better than the slim. Works great. Has a switch on back, which is nice. Slots all easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: audrey frances

customer_reviews.title: Very good condition*). The price seemed a little high to ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. (*Used, Very good condition*). The price seemed a little high to me but since it is no longer made, if you need to replace a PS2 to play the games you accumulated over the years, then there isn't much you can do. Came with all the parts (wires, controller and a memory card). Works great even though the console was very scratched up on the exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and dusty
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I bought this as a gift for my husband. The description stated it was like new but after finally arriving it was dirty, dusty with scratches and white marks on it. In addition, it looked as if it was just thrown into a box ---barely secured. With everything occurring right now ---it could have at least been cleaned and wiped off/down.....really????!!! I'm only doing one star because-- well....it did turn on. We'll see how long that lasts. A mess!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Came good as new but...
customer_reviews.text: While the system is clean and has no dents or scratches and turns on, my main problem is that it would not load my ps2 games at all. I’d either receive an error message or a message indicating I did not put the correct disc in. I tried cleaning the disc reader without opening the system (I tried to but the screws were too tight and I was afraid to damage it) with no luck. I feel like I bought this ps2 for nothing now.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Console didn’t come with controller or usb cables as described in product description.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Pressley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Works well. Was not cleaned internally, but no big deal. I converted the AV cords to HDMI, which took a lot of the blurriness away. Console will not work on a newer TV. Will only work on a 1080 or less TV.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Yonkers

customer_reviews.title: I recieved this product in very good condition, but sometimes the color would turn grey
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product in very good condition, but sometimes the color would turn grey. That was a problem with the cords not the console. Luckily, I still had my old cords and those worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blast From the Past
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and arrived cleaned like it was brand new with all the cords and a controller. Buy separately a memory card (just like the original) to save your high scores!
customer_reviews.author: Filmbuff

customer_reviews.title: unit scratched up and comes with broken controller
customer_reviews.text: bought under "used very good" condition, unit came with a lot of scratches, controller will not work, open up the controller and found out that it is already been opened before (two screws missing) and the vibration motors are broken. play games just fine, so 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LU YAN

customer_reviews.title: My son is very very happy Thank You Soo Much
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much my son loves it he has been asking for one he loves it he feels it much better then the Play Station 4 he had one at his dad's house and he doesn't like it at all so thank you so much for having it
customer_reviews.author: christine havlock

customer_reviews.title: Grew up with it, still love it as an adult.
customer_reviews.text: Truly one of the greatest buys there is, the best selling console of all time and what i consider one of the greatest consoles there is. Obviously it lacks in power and such, but it makes up for in memories and the massive library of games.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The console I was sold even though the seller said it was in “very good” condition was broken. What I ran into was a Game error so I couldn’t play any games. I tried fixing it but it seems like the problem I have would require me to get a new part for the PlayStation. I wouldn’t buy from this company cause they lie about the PlayStations condition; however when looking for any PlayStation online you’re probably going to have to do some type of repair when receiving one.
customer_reviews.author: Cha Boi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from GG Gaming, they don't care
customer_reviews.text: Received an incredibly dirty PS2 with a large crack and pieces missing from the left side. Wrong power cable even though it still worked. Knockoff controller came broken as well, unusable. Stutters to read discs but hey, it works.. kinda. I found out if it worked or not really quick because they didn't bother to take out the game that the original owner had in there. (Dragon Ball Z Budokai Tenkaichi 2). Save your money and go to a local retailer where you can actually see what you're buying.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Smith

customer_reviews.title: Arrived loose in a box and did not work.
customer_reviews.text: The unit cycled for about 60 seconds then just stopped working. I'm really not surprised considering how it was packaged. The pic is just after opening the box. The expansion bay cover was knocked off and loose in the box. I'm really not surprised it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Console System
customer_reviews.text: Does not play either PS1 games or CD's. I know it's old but you should stand behind the product you're selling for $100.00 "Disc Read Error" You knew about this even before you sold it!! Lesson Learned. PS2 games & DVD's do work.
customer_reviews.author: zillaphil57

customer_reviews.title: Poor condition
customer_reviews.text: This was not in “good” condition as claimed. The console was so dusty and filthy I had to thoroughly clean it before it would even turn on. The CD dispenser wouldnt open and had to be yanked out. Then I had to unscrew the bottom and clean out the inside because the laser could not even read the game.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rambeau

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Gameswift claims ps2 was tested and works great. Upon initially opening the box I noticed the unit looked to be in good shape with few scratches. But after plugging it in and inserting several different discs the unit would not read any of my games. I then put those same games into my old PS2 that I have memory card issues with and all games worked fine. So this one is being sent back the Gameswift for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item was sorta just like described but...
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping ! Came in like 5 days shipping box had holes in it! An HDD adapter wasn’t included. (Good thing i had one) A lil dusty, like how hard is it to clean a product before shipping! Good looking controller easy fix with changing out the joysticks. Cables looked pretty New as well. But overall works like it’s supposed to considering the age of the console.
customer_reviews.author: K joint

customer_reviews.title: Thank you :)
customer_reviews.text: Had a little bit of trouble with USPS, they made the mistake and sent it back but the seller went out of his way to send it back to me and to pay the shipping, when I got it USPS had smashed in the side of the box and cracked the controller down the middle but i'm not worried about the controller. The system works perfectly and i'm happy to have it for my mother in law "we can easily get another controller", it came a little over wrapped in plastic but I am very happy for the extra protection he put on it... if it weren't for the protection USPS might have destroyed the entire system lol
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: Other than it coming with no memory card which is something to keep in mind, good thing I ordered more. It was actually working perfectly fine. The console itself is dusty and very little scratches but for it’s age this a great condition you can just wipe the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Godson very sad today when opened up his box only to find ...
customer_reviews.text: Godson very sad today when opened up his box only to find a piece of crap PS2 with all the inside comp components missing. SMH. No power cord, no AV color cord. Just a remote and a PS2 that cant be used because the inside components were gutted out. DONT BY FROM THIS SELLER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Only way to play ps and ps2 games.
customer_reviews.text: The only way to play your ps and ps2 console video games,a well worth edition to those of us old school video game phans.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon P.

customer_reviews.title: Dont belive what the describtion say unless you dont reall care!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the console but I checked the description and it said it came with all cables , and 2 ps2 controllers and what do I get only the console itself and the power cable. I didn't mind it as much but it's best to say what ACTUALLY come with the console instead of just saying all this BS and just giving us only the power cable and console only!
customer_reviews.author: sixelFTW

customer_reviews.title: Ps2 console
customer_reviews.text: Rustyrivermedia is really good. It was everything they said. Cleaned, worked, all the wires controller and 2 games. Wow I gave them 5 stars because for a 25 year old console it had barely any scratches the tray worked really good it was so clean of dust inside. Now we will see how long it last but if I could give Rustyrivermedia 6 stars I would. ( Tom Clancy’s ghost recon and baller nice ). Beyond expectations
customer_reviews.author: billy cline

customer_reviews.title: The ps2 itself is in great shape, the home screen freezes a little but ...
customer_reviews.text: The ps2 itself is in great shape, the home screen freezes a little but even when the objects on the welcome screen are frozen in the wrong place they still function correctly and it plays the actual video game very smoothly. Good shipping time no communication necessary.
customer_reviews.author: kaila

customer_reviews.title: It was in great shape and is working superbly
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this purchase. It was in great shape and is working superbly. The only gripe I had was it's shipping container. It was packed in a very thin box and it just so happened to be raining at the time of it's delivery. You should had seen the look of the mailman's face when he handed me the box and the console tore through and hit the floor. The only thing that saved it was that it did have a healthy wrapping of bubble pack. But the thing still works great and I'm having a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excited to try out a Fat playstation2
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a fat PlayStation 2 Friday and was expecting it on the 7th but I got it on the 3rd so I hooked it up and got everything ready and the games that I couldn't play on my other PlayStation slim 2 it worked on this one I was very impressed!!!! I'm also a big gamer,have over 100 games. So when I played on this Fat PS2 I am very happy with it......
customer_reviews.author: RICHELLE GREEN

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent seller item does not read discs
customer_reviews.text: This item does not read discs seller sold a broken system saying that it works but it does not fraudulent seller
customer_reviews.author: Cheeseilton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic service!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic purchase. It arrived on time and in perfect condition! Thank you so much! You have made my grandson so happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Games are on!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a starter for a special friend of ours that is 7. At that age we wanted something that he could start with and learn to take care of without the worry of a big investment. He Loves it and it has given him a big respect for having his first unit. We are proud of the way that he has learned to take care of his unit and the unit has done all that was promised. An excellent starter unit for beginners. By the way it sure does more and has great graphics for an older unit.
customer_reviews.author: DD Gott - Donadees Corner

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, I can't play all my PS2 games and I can't save my progress. Wouldn't buy from this seller ever again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: The tray was malfunctioning so I was unable to use it but I called tech support and they weren’t able to help the had me return it and refund the items but now I have to reorder another one. All I want was to play the games that I grew up with and enjoy them again with my dad.😫
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: No cables and no controller
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with a controller and power cables even though that’s how it was advertised on the item description
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work games come on but then makes a ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work games come on but then makes a loud noise at the start menu and wont do anything else after that. I cant even press start.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game console as a kid and I love it now that I’m 30. No problem with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice fat model, mine just had one issue
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine used, and it came with all the cords, and even a memory card! Sadly I found out that the DVD reading function is dead, so I cannot play DVD games only CD games and PS1 games, but that's fine for now as the system boots up just fine and I do have some good games to play with it on, just wish I could play Kingdom Hearts and Tekken 5 (which is why I bought it), but when I plan to replace it, I'll buy the slim model.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Anime Girl

customer_reviews.title: Bought the unit to replace a broken one - and STILL had to fix it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the game console to replace a broken unit for a relative. It arrived in the expected time-frame and was packaged very well, yet when my relative powered up the unit and put in a game disc - nothing. It wouldn't load the game data and actually cycled itself on and off a few times. After searhing the internet I was able to find an article on how to fix the cosole and it is now fully operational and my relative is quite happy. Buyers beware, however, as the item description said that the console was fully functional and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: SaintIves

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was in great condition! I liked that it worked great! I liked that it was packaged great! I liked that delivery was super fast received it in 3 days😃 My grandson loves it! Great purchase! Thank you maxwell books & electronics!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: It's all good
customer_reviews.text: I received the order actually quick, not lost. Problem was the dual shock controller included was broken. Not completely, but did not work on this one or my friends. I had to order another controller, another 25 bucks and everything works great, gaming and DVD functions. Didn't and don't know who to contact or express this too.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Unit!
customer_reviews.text: No real problems to report at this time.I play it often and used to have one before the sound went out of it. THANK YOU!!!!
customer_reviews.author: brooksy

customer_reviews.title: works great play station 2
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for an early father's day gift. he wanted this playstation 2 as his old one died on him. this is second hand but works great!! I am glad he can enjoy it! the seller did a nice a job!
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: The product was faulty and there was some sort of defect where it would not play the video game disk. You have to beware when buying from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fan was dead
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't advertised with controller so bought one along with a memory card. That was fine. Console arrived the language was set on French. Played for about 10 minutes and the game stopped. Game was brand new. Turned it back on and my friend noted it was very quiet. Turns out the fan was dead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It was his birthday present he's wanted a new one for years
customer_reviews.author: Lillian D Phan

customer_reviews.title: The console will probably work, at least
customer_reviews.text: Controller was included, but unusable. Contacted seller but never heard back. Console works fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mann

customer_reviews.title: I personally love the PS2
customer_reviews.text: I personally love the PS2, but the one I had before was stolen out of my garage just before we were going to move. My room mate at the time had one so I didn't think about replacing until I moved into my own home. I decided to get one since one of my favorite games is for the 2 however what I received was the console ONLY. Despite the description saying it comes with a controller and the necessary cables all that was in the box was the console. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Make it look like it works...
customer_reviews.text: System works pretty well, but the controller that came with it wouldn't work at all. Had to barrow another one from a friend just to see if it was the system or the controller because the controllers light would turn on but would register on the console at all.
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I am never one to rate products, but I am truly disappointed in this one. I received the product on the day I was expected to receive it. I was super excited and bought several games, but was very upset when the disc tray would not read any discs. I bought another PlayStation and all discs read fine, so it was the product that was the issue. I do not recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Tianna Moore

customer_reviews.title: Best PS2 model
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best PS2 model that was created it's still fun to play today.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Huggins

customer_reviews.title: System was in really good shape and works well
customer_reviews.text: System is really clean and looks almost brand new. It works like new and was a great choice. Seller was fast and easy to work with. Had no problems at all with seller or system.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Fallrose Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Husband wanted this to play kingdom hearts and was so excited that this worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: laurin

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: The item was a bit used but works fine. I'm glad i was able to find one online for a god price.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Works like new! Nostalgia!
customer_reviews.text: Works like new! Enjoying introducing my daughter to the fun games I used to play with her older brothers.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyside

customer_reviews.title: Catboy is happily playing games on his New Playstation 2!
customer_reviews.text: The game is in excellent condition, it barely looks used at all except for a small back screen/panel part missing- which does not effect the game at all. The system works purrfectly, it was just as described and arrived much sooner than expected (about 3 days after ordering it). It arrived on the 9th yet was expected on the 31st, Will recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Meowstopheles

customer_reviews.title: May need work to get it to work
customer_reviews.text: I got and it the disk would not open all the way. So I thought it was busted. So I thought I should see if I can fix, can't break what is already broken. Took it apart and found it just came off track. Put it back tested it seem to work, put all back together and it works perfectly... just need to get check out. Using it a love it...
customer_reviews.author: Albert Lee Kornegay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked a bit used but it's a damn ps2. Of course it Does! Works great- not a single problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Flores

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Some dust on fan and inside. Otherwise fine. Didn’t come with a memory card, but pretty sure that wasn’t specified anyways. All in all, good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Gross

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best console of its generation
customer_reviews.text: Truly the best console of its generation. The only thing you really have to worry about with this one is that they tend to have issues with the disc reading laser but you can easily fix this at home.
customer_reviews.author: Sandwich

customer_reviews.title: but came quickly and is working pretty okay, disk tray kinda sticks but overall okay
customer_reviews.text: I probably shouldn't have assumed that I would get AV cables and a controller with the console, but came quickly and is working pretty okay, disk tray kinda sticks but overall okay, but just be cautious of which seller you purchase from.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Old but still good.
customer_reviews.text: I did not purchase this console from Amazon.com, but I have a Playstation 2 (Phat). If you are purchasing a Playstation 2 for gaming only, I would recommend the slim version. However if you are looking to mod, or play games off a hard drive, then this is the console for you. My Playstation 2 has FreeMCBoot (soft mod only), and I run my games off the HDD. PM me if you are interested in modding this console, I will help as much as I can.
customer_reviews.author: BLKBRDSR71

customer_reviews.title: ... plug it in lol it's so absurd it's kinda funny
customer_reviews.text: Um the description says it would include the av and ac cables and one controller it had none of those things I can't say if it works or not since I can't plug it in lol it's so absurd it's kinda funny
customer_reviews.author: Kelly315

customer_reviews.title: No one says which vendor they selected regardless of whether they hate it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a "very good" console from Panda Dustin. It came with a power cable only. No controller, no memory card, no av cable, no games... just a console and a cord. That said, it works, but the machine purrs louder than I remember. I'm not mad.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Broken ps2
customer_reviews.text: I received this ps2 and it looked nice but when I turned it on to play games the console overheated and wouldn't turn back on the first day I received it. I highly recommend not purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Jacolenne

customer_reviews.title: I like Playstation 2 's
customer_reviews.text: I really like my playstation 2 console. Play it all the time ... Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Price

customer_reviews.title: The Legend
customer_reviews.text: Plays PS2/PS1 games, it's like two systems in one. Time to order the classics...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just went to use the console and the cd tray ...
customer_reviews.text: Just went to use the console and the cd tray will not come out all the way. It is jammed up and keeps automatically closing. No point in having the console of you can put any games in it
customer_reviews.author: Debra C.

customer_reviews.title: Great condition!
customer_reviews.text: The PS2 I received was in excellent condition and works perfectly. Arrived quickly undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Suprisingly got the PlayStation quicker than imagined being stuck in the Middle East, which was awesome. Plugging it up and getting it all set up was another issue. We had a red dot for half a second, after that no power. We have been working on it for over half an hour now trying to get it going, but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Burgett

customer_reviews.title: For a few days I thought it didn't work but ...
customer_reviews.text: For a few days I thought it didn't work but I realized it does but you just have to wait about 8 to 10 mins before the console recognizes the disk very very slow loading.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: the seller, GoodDeals,  is a scam
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work, probably due to the lovely package job, pictured, that the seller did. The controller port did not work and no games loaded. Once returned, the seller, GoodDeals, claimed that it works fine and issued a partial refund. I will personally never purchase another product from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kleinbrook

customer_reviews.title: GAMESWIFT you guys rock !
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much GAMESWIFT ! The system was very clean and everything was wrapped and packaged nicely! The system is quiet as a mouse ! And better yet I got my item a day early ! I was skeptical about purchasing online but I defently recommend game swift and will be buying again with you guys !
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Davis

customer_reviews.title: Console came in good shape, works properly.
customer_reviews.text: Console came in good shape and works just fine. The controller had a rumble motor loose on the right side, and the red end of the AV cord was broken but these are easily replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Before buying confirm working conditions
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, when I received my PS2 it stated disk reading errors. Tried both brand new PS2 games and DVD. I was forced to returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

product_meta.title: Playstation 2 Console - Black
product_meta.description:
PS2 Console has been tested and works GREAT!! Set includes: PS2 Console + One Dual Shock Controller + 8MB Memory Card + AC Power Cord + AV Cord + BONUS Random Game. Some wear on console from normal usage. Retail box and manual are NOT included. Ships out FAST!!

AMAZON.COM
The PlayStation2 is equipped with a 128-bit Emotion Engine processor that enables lightning-fast gameplay and impressive graphics power. The console builds on its home entertainment value by doubling as a DVD player and accommodating most of the original PlayStation's vast library of games. PS2 is known for its excellent selection of titles for the older gamer.
feature_bullets: Includes b;ue dual shock contoller, A/V cable and power cable.
